alert.note: Alert for Garfield; McCone (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 07 at 9:04PM MDT by NWS Glasgow
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Garfield and southwestern McCone Counties through 945 PM MDT... At 903 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Flowing Wells Rest Area, or 25 miles west of Circle, moving northwest at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Flowing Wells Rest Area and Van Norman. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
